verses.t: I beseech{G3870} you{G5209} therefore{G3767}, brethren{G80}, by{G1223} the mercies{G3588} of God{G3588}, that ye present{G3936} your{G5216} bodies{G3588} a{G2378} living{G2198} sacrifice{G2378}, holy{G40}, acceptable{G2101} unto God{G3588}, which is your{G5216} reasonable{G3050} service{G2999}.

And{G2532} be{G4964} not{G3361} conformed{G4964} to{G3588} this{G5129} world{G165}: but{G235} be ye transformed{G3339} by the renewing{G3588} of{G3588} your{G5216} mind{G3563}, that{G1519} ye{G5209} may prove{G1381} what{G5101} is that{G3588} good{G18}, and{G2532} acceptable{G2101}, and{G2532} perfect{G5046}, will{G2307} of God{G3588}.

For{G1063} I say{G3004}, through{G1223} the grace{G3588} given{G1325} unto me{G3427}, to every man{G3956} that is{G5607} among{G1722} you{G5213}, not{G3361} to think{G5252} of himself more highly{G5252} than{G3844} he ought{G1163} to think{G5426}; but{G235} to think{G5426} soberly{G4993}, according as{G5613} God{G3588} hath dealt{G3307} to every man{G1538} the measure{G3358} of faith{G4102}.
For{G1063} as{G2509} we have{G2192} many{G4183} members{G3196} in{G1722} one{G1520} body{G4983}, and{G1161} all{G3956} members{G3196} have{G2192} not{G3756} the{G4234} same{G846} office{G4234}:
So{G3779} we{G2070}, being many{G4183}, are{G2070} one{G1520} body{G4983} in{G1722} Christ{G5547}, and{G1161} every{G2596} one{G1520} members{G3196} one of another{G240}.

Having{G2192} then{G1161} gifts{G5486} differing{G1313} according to{G2596} the grace{G3588} that is given{G1325} to us{G2254}, whether{G1535} prophecy{G4394}, let us prophesy according to{G2596} the proportion{G3588} of faith{G3588};
Or{G1535} ministry{G1248}, let us wait on{G1722} our ministering{G3588}: or{G1535} he that teacheth{G1321}, on{G1722} teaching{G3588};

Or{G1535} he that exhorteth{G3870}, on{G1722} exhortation{G3588}: he that giveth{G3330}, let him do it with{G1722} simplicity{G572}; he that ruleth{G4291}, with{G1722} diligence{G4710}; he that sheweth mercy{G1653}, with{G1722} cheerfulness{G2432}.
Let love{G26} be without dissimulation{G505}. Abhor{G655} that which is evil{G4190}; cleave{G2853} to that which is good{G18}.Tag 2 has no Gk??
Be kindly affectioned{G5387} one{G240} to{G1519} another{G240} with brotherly love{G3588}; in honour{G3588} preferring{G4285} one another{G240};
Not{G3361} slothful{G3636} in business{G3588}; fervent{G2204} in spirit{G3588}; serving{G1398} the Lord{G2962};Tag 9 appears to be spurious (alternate reading?)
Rejoicing{G5463} in hope{G3588}; patient{G5278} in tribulation{G3588}; continuing instant{G4342} in prayer{G3588};
Distributing{G2841} to the necessity{G3588} of saints{G40}; given to{G1377} hospitality{G3588}.
Bless{G2127} them which persecute{G1377} you{G5209}: bless{G2127}, and{G2532} curse{G2672} not{G3361}.
Rejoice{G5463} with{G3326} them that do rejoice{G5463}, and{G2532} weep{G2799} with{G3326} them that weep{G2799}.

Be of{G5426} the same{G846} mind{G5426} one{G240} toward{G1519} another{G240}. Mind{G5426} not{G3361} high things{G5308}, but{G235} condescend{G4879} to men of low estate{G5011}. Be{G1096} not{G3361} wise{G5429} in{G3844} your own conceits{G1438}.
Recompense{G591} to no man{G3367} evil{G2556} for{G473} evil{G2556}. Provide{G4306} things honest{G2570} in the sight of{G1799} all{G3956} men{G444}.
If{G1487} it be possible{G1415}, as much as lieth in{G1537} you{G5216}, live peaceably{G1514} with{G3326} all{G3956} men{G444}.

Dearly beloved{G27}, avenge{G1556} not{G3361} yourselves{G1438}, but{G235} rather give{G1325} place{G5117} unto wrath{G3588}: for{G1063} it is written{G1125}, Vengeance{G1557} is mine{G1698}; I{G1473} will repay{G467}, saith{G3004} the Lord{G2962}.

Therefore{G3767} if{G1437} thine{G4675} enemy{G2190} hunger{G3983}, feed{G5595} him{G846}; if{G1437}he thirst{G1372}, give{G4222} him{G846} drink{G4222}: for{G1063} in so{G5124} doing{G4160} thou shalt heap{G4987} coals{G440} of fire{G4442} on{G1909} his{G846} head{G3588}.
Be{G3528} not{G3361} overcome{G3528} of{G5259} evil{G2556}, but{G235} overcome{G3528} evil{G2556} with{G1722} good{G18}.
